title: Spotify brings live audio shows to main app, renames Greenroom to Spotify Live
content:
The social audio app Clubhouse rose to fame in late 2020 and early 2021, and it didn’t take long for nearly every other messaging and social media platform to create their own version. Spotify has been working on its own audio room service for over a year, and now the company is rolling it out

The post Spotify brings live audio shows to main app, renames Greenroom to Spotify Live appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Spotify's live audio app is being renamed to Spotify Live, and some of the functionality is coming to the main Spotify app.
